author: Kelsey Garcia
title: The 3 "No-Makeup Makeup" Products Alicia Keys Uses in Her Barefaced Beauty Routine
text:
What Beauty Products Does Alicia Keys Use? The 3 "No-Makeup Makeup" Products Alicia Keys Uses in Her Barefaced Beauty Routine January 25, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 The 3 "No-Makeup Makeup" Products Alicia Keys Uses in Her Barefaced Beauty Routine 
Since her announcement in 2016 , Alicia Keys is staying committed to her new no-makeup lifestyle. She's looking pretty damn stunning while doing it, too. 
While her decision has generated a conversation both in the media and online, it's also brought up one very important question: what skin care products is she using? Thankfully, her go-to beauty specialist, who simply goes by Dotti, shared her routine with W . 
Some of Alicia's skin secrets are what one might expect. Dotti said, "Alicia gets regular facials, does acupuncture, and she eats healthy and exercises." She added, "She knows you have to invest internally for your skin to look great externally." Dotti did, however, divulge some of Alicia's additional tips and tricks apart from just being a generally radiant and gorgeous human being . . . and that includes some very subtle "no-makeup makeup." 
Look ahead for Alicia's favorite formulas, including the few makeup products she actually wears. Related:
